page.title: 04RELIGION
page.content: IN BARNET WE HAVE MANY DIFFERENT RELIGIONS LIKE CHRISTIAN, MUSLIM, JEWISH,HINDU & SIKH. WE DON'T ALL HAVE TO BE ONE RELIGION. YOU CAN CHOOSE WHICH RELIGION YOU ARE OR WANT TO BE. WE SURVEYED 3 KINDS OF CHRISTIAN RELIGION-ANGLICAN, CATHOLIC NUNS AND EVANGELICAL BAPTIST. WE FOUND THAT ALL OF THEM HELD SERVICES TWICE A DAY ON SUNDAYS. THE PEOPLE IN CHARGE OF THE SERVICES WERE: - ANGLICAN-RECTOR, CATHOLIC NUNS-MOTHER SUPERIOR,BAPTIST- MINISTER.THE NUNS SPENT A GREAT DEAL OF THEIR TIME IN SILENT PRAYER AND SERVICES EACH DAY OF THE WEEK AS WELL. ALL THE RELIGIOUS LEADERS SPENT SOME OF THEIR TIME TEACHING,EITHER IN SCHOOLS OR AT THEIR PLACE OF WORSHIP. THE REST OF THE TIME WAS SPENT IN VISITING THE SICK AND THE ELDERLY OR HELPING PEOPLE IN NEED.
